archiefmat.titel: Correspondentie - particuliere personen [o.a. P. Arrièns en J.J. Garney]
archiefmat.titel_eng: Correspondence - private persons [including P. Arrièns and J.J. Garney]
archiefmat.scope:
19th century.

For example:

VIc-A, - Pieter Arrièns, on the frigate "Maas" commanded by captain Arrièns prince Hendrik (1820-1879) went to the Netherlands West Indies (1835)

VIc-G, - Joseph John Garney, details about the situation of the slaves in the British and Dutch West Indies (1841)
archiefmat.notes: Only approved consultation permitted. For example: VIc-A, - Pieter Arrièns: prince Hendrik (1820-1879) traveled to the Netherlands West Indies aboard the frigate "Maas", commanded by Captain Arrièns (1835);  and VIc-G, - Joseph John Garney: details about the situation of slaves in the British and Netherlands West Indies (1841).
